metadata.name: VIRGO 01 BLACK EMERALD #006/52
metadata.description: Welcome to CULT&RAIN DROP 002\. Following two successful drops of sneakers and varsity jackets, CULT&RAIN continues to expand its wardrobe with DROP 002\. CULT&RAIN will carry the luxury fashion industry into the future with 209 highly-coveted phygital hoodies. Each 3D animated NFT includes a premium hoodie that will be made from the finest fabrication and embedded with an NFC chip, powered by LTD.INC, that is paired one-to-one with the NFT. Holders will receive a variety of digital and physical utilities based on rarities such as a matching pair of ‘Made in Italy’ luxury sneakers, FREE 3D AR wearable via DRESSX, FREE future mints (CULTR PAD), brand discounts, exclusive airdrops, and VIP access into the CULT&RAIN ecosystem.
